TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NullExtension extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension

summary.span: 实现 XAML 标记扩展以返回 null 对象，你可使用此对象在 XAML 中将值显式设置为 null。

span.span: Implements a XAML markup extension in order to return a null object, which you can use to explicitly set values to null in XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 XAML 中，null 和空字符串通常不等效。In XAML, null and empty string are generally not equivalent. 使用 `{x:Null}` 扩展用法可以设置将基础属性设置为的特性 `null` 。You use the `{x:Null}` extension usage in order to set an attribute that sets the underlying property to `null`. 有关设置 null 值如何与 XAML 中的方案相关的详细信息，请参阅 [X:Null 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension)。For more information on how setting null values is relevant for scenarios in XAML, see [x:Null Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension). 此类是一个标记扩展实现。This class is a markup extension implementation. 标记扩展类主要用于为 XAML 处理器解释特定扩展的方式提供基础结构支持。Markup extension classes exist mainly to provide infrastructure support for how XAML processors interpret a particular extension. 标记扩展实现类公开的成员通常不应从代码中调用。The members that markup extension implementation classes expose are not typically intended to be called from your code. 此标记扩展类支持 .NET XAML 服务的 [X:Null 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension) 用法。This markup extension class supports the [x:Null Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension) usage for .NET XAML Services. 在以前版本的 .NET Framework 中，此类 (和 `x:Null` 标记扩展 XAML 行为支持以及相关的 xmlns 映射) 存在于 WPF 特定的程序集 PresentationFramework 中。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class (and the `x:Null` markup extension XAML behavior support as well as the relevant xmlns mapping) existed in the WPF-specific assembly PresentationFramework. 在中 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] ， 为 system.exception 程序集。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 这使 `x:Null` 使用情况可用于使用引用 .NET XAML 服务的框架的应用程序。This makes the `x:Null` usage available to applications using frameworks that reference .NET XAML Services. 只要目标为，就不需要 PresentationFramework 作为引用的程序集 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 。You do not need PresentationFramework as a referenced assembly so long as you are targeting [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml). System.exception 程序集使用 将程序集中的所有类型映射到 xaml 语言 () 的 xaml 命名空间 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xamlxmlnsv1](~/includes/tlasharptla-xamlxmlnsv1-md.md)] 。The System.Xaml assembly uses to map all types in the assembly to the XAML namespace for the XAML language ([!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xamlxmlnsv1](~/includes/tlasharptla-xamlxmlnsv1-md.md)]). 通常， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xamlxmlnsv1](~/includes/tlasharptla-xamlxmlnsv1-md.md)] 在根元素映射中声明前缀，并使用前缀 `x` 。Typically you declare a prefix for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xamlxmlnsv1](~/includes/tlasharptla-xamlxmlnsv1-md.md)] in a root element mapping and use the prefix `x`. ## WPF 用法说明WPF Usage Notes 对于 WPF 依赖项属性，将依赖项属性值设置为时， `null` 不一定要将属性设置为其默认值，即使它是引用属性也是如此。For WPF dependency properties, when you set a dependency property value to `null`, you are not necessarily setting the property to its default value, even if it is a reference property. 依赖项属性的默认值取决于其依赖项属性的注册。The default value of a dependency property depends on its dependency property registration. 未设置的值不一定是 `null` ; 请参见 。An unset value is not necessarily `null` either; see . 有关详细信息，请参阅 或 [依赖属性概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview)。For more information, see or [Dependency Properties Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview).

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object ProvideValue(class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ProvideValue (serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As Object

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 可为标记扩展实现提供服务的对象。

span.span: An object that can provide services for the markup extension implementation.

summary.span: 提供 以用作此标记扩展的输出值。

span.span: Provides to use as a value as the output of this markup extension.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法支持 XAML 处理器实现，不应直接调用。This method supports XAML processor implementations, and is not intended to be called directly. XAML 处理器实现在创建包含扩展用法的对象图时使用此方法 `x:Null` 。A XAML processor implementation uses this method when it creates object graphs that include an `x:Null` extension usage. 这依赖于 XAML 处理器在处理任何 并调用其实现时的常规行为 `ProvideValue` 。This relies on general behavior for XAML processors when they process any and call its `ProvideValue` implementation. 此实现不依赖于基于的服务 `serviceProvider` 。This implementation does not rely on services that are based on the passed `serviceProvider`. 不管上下文如何，它始终返回空引用。It always returns a null reference regardless of context. 在 .NET Framework XAML 服务实现中，通过引用静态值获得要返回的值 。In the .NET Framework XAML Services implementation, the value to return is obtained by referencing the static value.
